trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate and that the certificate is mapped to a Windows domain user or local computer user account.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 X.509 证书的安全令牌以及将证书映射到 Windows 域用户或本地计算机用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: Typically, application developers do not need to use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> class, unless a Web service must gain access to details about a X.509 certificate referenced in an incoming SOAP message or the domain or computer account that the certificate is mapped to.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序开发人员不需要使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 类，除非 Web 服务必须获取访问在传入 SOAP 消息中引用的 X.509 证书的详细信息的权限，或者获取访问将证书映射到的域或计算机帐户的权限。

trans-unit.source: To get the details of the X.509 certificate, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取 X.509 证书的详细信息，请访问 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: To get the user identity, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取用户标识，请参见 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate and Windows domain or computer account.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 证书和 Windows 域或计算机帐户来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a unique identifier for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> security token and assigns that value to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 安全令牌的唯一标识符，并将该值分配给 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 X.509 证书的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the identity of a Windows domain or computer account.
trans-unit.target: 标识 Windows 域或计算机帐户的标识。

trans-unit.source: The authentication type for the token.
trans-unit.target: 令牌的身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the security token.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate, Windows domain or computer account, and unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 证书、Windows 域或计算机帐户以及唯一标识符来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication type for the token.
trans-unit.target: 获取令牌的身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 使用完 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> 后调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> 方法后，必须释放对 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 的所有引用，这样垃圾收集器才能收回 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 占用的内存。

trans-unit.source: Always call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用之前，均应调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity of a Windows domain or computer account.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Windows 域或计算机帐户的标识。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> that represents the identity of a Windows domain or computer account.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" />，表示 Windows 域或计算机帐户的标识。
